HomePage.description: I am a university freshman full-stack engineer who is learning a lot of knowledge about programming in Taiwan. Learn programming from an early age through self-study. I like innovation and thinking. I am interested in it. My personality is always be positive. I love learning new things and chanllenge myself. Improve my ability through repeated learning. I also like make friends. Discuss these information and knowledge can make me excited. I found my own team though teaching others. And finish hard projects and things by team collaboration.
